title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 490.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 490.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part establishes science-based projections of sea
level rise for New York State's tidal coast, including the marine coasts of

Nassau, Suffolk and Westchester counties and the five boroughs of New York

City, and the main stem of the Hudson River, north from New York City to the
federal dam at Troy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
490.1

Adopted

New

York State Register February 22, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 08, eff. 2/22/2017

Amended

New

York State Register September 25, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 39, eff. 9/25/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
